description: two shirtless men climbing a tall pole, with another shirtless man bending to put his hands in a pot at LLC and a fourth shirtless man at bottom center watching climbers; woman with a dark blouse, seen from back, LRC; people looking out windows of four-story building in background; crowd on street in middle ground
marks:
Signature, Title, Inscription and Stamp

LRC, in LRC, in pencil: [A Lepère no 14]
title: Un 14 Juillet, rue Galande, le Mât de Cocagne
